casebody.data:
IN RE: T.K. 175P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 5, 2017 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, for T.K. Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of June 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of June 2017."
